item.title: Welcome to My Research Blog
item.dc:creator: Siddharth Tumre
item.description:
Source: Unsplash

Welcome to my personal research blog! I’m Siddharth Tumre, a researcher at TCS Research, where my research focuses on applying Natural Language Processing (NLP) and Large Language Models (LLMs) for real-world applications.

This space will serve as a platform to:

  • 📚 Share insights and updates from my research
  • 🛠️ Discuss technical approaches, challenges, and experiments
  • 🔎 Reflect on trends in NLP, LLMs, and their applications
  • ✍️ Post tutorials, demos, and thoughts.

If you’re interested in applied AI, language models, or how to make cutting-edge NLP work for real-world domains, you’re in the right place.

Thanks for stopping by!

Feel free to connect with me on Linkedin or Twitter.
